description.value:
Activation: 2

Battles are won and lost in moments of brief inattention or exhaustion. You create and exploit these opportunities, patiently waiting to vanquish your foe in a single stroke.

Spend 1 focus to move up to half your movement rate, then make a melee weapon attack against the Cognitive defense of a target who has 0 focus. This attack ignores your target’s deflect value and deals an extra [[/r 4d6]] damage on a hit. It can’t graze, only miss or hit.

This talent becomes more powerful as your tier increases: at tier 3, you roll an extra [[/r 6d6]] damage (instead of 4d6); at tier 4, you instead roll an extra [[/r 8d6]] damage; and at tier 5, you instead roll an extra [[/r 10d6]] damage.
